head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STROMBERG, HARMON SPENCER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STROMBERG, HARMON SPENCER

block.p: STROMBERG-Harmon Spencer. 55. Of Brookville, NY, on May 7, 2000. Beloved husband of Seena. Loving father of Alexander and Larah. Dear brother of Wendy Morheim. Services today, May 9th, at 1PM, at ''Gutterman's'', 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, LI, NY. In lieu of flowers the family request donations to the Samuel Waxman Cancer Research Foundation, 1150 Fifth Ave., New York, NY 10128.
